title.rendered: “Is Tom Hanks multi-lingual? No, he’s just getting a little help from AI”

excerpt.rendered: Bad lip-syncing in dubbing and subtitles have always put off audiences wherever they are in the world, box office takings of foreign films show. AI may be about to change all that. Francesca Lynagh reports.
